Texts.Eng: Mulch is useful in a ^orange;growing tray^reset; as a ^green;weak fertilizer^reset;. You can craft all sorts of chemicals, plastics and lab-made materials. Be sure to upgrade it when you can!

So you've built an ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset; and want to learn to use it? Simple enough. Just don't blow yourself to bits, please. Place it down and start by making some ^orange;mulch^reset; for fertilizer.
